abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says 2014 death of Kansas man who suffered from fever and fatigue after a tick bite was likely caused by a new virus called Bourbon virus.
lead_paragraph: A new virus appears to have caused the death last spring of a man in Kansas, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported Friday in its journal Emerging Infectious Diseases.

headline.main: New Virus Suspected in Death of Kansas Man
headline.print_headline: New Virus Suspected in Death of Kansas Man
